name: Output Biosciences
headline: Teaching Generative AI the Language of Biology
description: Output Biosciences is pioneering Biologically-Aware Generative AI to finally understand complex biological systems. Our new generative AI architecture can handle the extremely long, nonlinear, fragmented, and high dimensional data of biological systems. We are building Large Biological Models that can generate breakthrough medicines and transform the way we diagnose, treat and prevent disease.

founders.name: Mirella Mashiach, Founder
founders.description: Mirella is a former big pharma executive and biotech investor. She was the Managing Director of the $200M corporate venture biotech fund at Teva Pharmaceuticals and its VP of BD and Strategy. Prior to that, Mirella was an attorney at Dentons, where she focused on intellectual property and corporate and commercial deals in life sciences.

founders.name: Adi Mashiach, MD, Founder
founders.description: Adi is a repeat founder of AI-driven biotech startups, former physician, and computational systems biology researcher. He was the founder of Nyxoah (NASDAQ:NYXH), a leading sleep apnea therapy based on a neurotech and adaptive learning platform. He founded Innovea (acquired), a medical imaging startup focused on diffusion-based computer vision. His innovative research in machine learning and nonlinear dynamics predicted cancer therapy responses from cell images. Adi holds over 85 US patents.

raw_markdown="# **Teaching Generative AI the Language of Biology**
## Output is pioneering Biologically-Aware Generative AI to finally understand complex biological systems
We are building Large Biological Models that can generate breakthrough medicines. Our new generative AI architecture can handle the extremely long, nonlinear, fragmented, and high dimensional data of biological systems, capable of transforming the way we diagnose, treat and prevent disease. We are repeat founders of AI-driven biotech startups, physicians, researchers in computational systems biology and nonlinear dynamics, and experienced biotech executives and investors. We’re excited to be at the forefront of biology and generative AI and advance humanity to a new level of health.
## We're hiring!
If you’re impatient to see how your work improves people’s lives and advances humanity to a new level of health, this is the place for you.
[Join the team](https://www.outputbio.com/</jobs>)

generated_description:
Output Biosciences is an ambitious biotech startup based in New York, established in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2021 batch. Their mission? To teach Generative AI the language of biology, a venture that seeks to revolutionize how we understand and manipulate complex biological systems.

At the core of Output Biosciences is their pioneering work in biologically-aware generative AI. They’ve developed a new AI architecture that can grapple with the intricate and often messy data typical of biological research—think long, nonlinear sequences and high-dimensional datasets. Their goal is to create Large Biological Models that are capable of producing groundbreaking medicines and transforming our approaches to diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases.

The team behind Output is comprised of repeat founders who have a wealth of experience in AI-driven biotech startups, as well as physicians and researchers skilled in computational systems biology and nonlinear dynamics. This diverse expertise positions them at the cutting edge of both biology and generative AI, and they are driven by a clear vision: to elevate human health to new heights.

If you're looking to be part of a team that’s committed to making a real difference in people’s lives, Output Biosciences is hiring. They value individuals who are eager to see their work impact the world in meaningful ways.

For more information on their initiatives or to explore career opportunities, you can visit their website at [Output Biosciences](https://www.outputbio.com/).
